articles.description: Noah Lyles won Olympic men's 100m gold by five-thousandths of a second at Paris 2024 in a dramatic final which proved the fastest race in history.
articles.title: Olympics men's 100m final: How Noah Lyles won the greatest race in history

articles.description: Britain's Molly Caudery is eliminated in qualification for the women's pole vault final at the 2024 Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Molly Caudery fails to qualify for women's pole vault final at Paris Olympics 2024

articles.description: Noah Lyles says the finish to the men's 100m was a "crazy" moment as he beat Jamaica's Kishane Thompson by by five-thousandths of a second to win the Olympic title in Paris.
articles.title: Noah Lyles: 100m finish was 'against 'best of the best'

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Former England and Surrey batter Graham Thorpe dies aged 55, says the England and Wales Cricket Board.
articles.title: Graham Thorpe: Former England batter dies aged 55

articles.description: Simone Biles falls off the beam to miss out on a medal for the first time at the Paris Olympics as Alice d'Amato takes gold.
articles.title: Olympics gymnastics: Simone Biles falls off beam and misses out on medal in Paris

articles.description: All the latest football transfer news and speculation, plus pre-season friendlies reaction and build-up.
articles.title: Latest transfer news & pre-season friendlies reaction

articles.description: Chelsea midfielder Conor Gallagher agrees to join Atletico Madrid.
articles.title: Chelsea: Conor Gallagher agrees £33m Atletico Madrid move

articles.description: Great Britain claim Olympic triathlon mixed team relay bronze after a photo finish decides a thrilling final leg in Paris.
articles.title: Olympics triathlon: Alex Yee, Georgia Taylor-Brown, Sam Dickinson and Beth Potter take bronze in mixed team relay
